# graphing-and-eda

This is where I put EDA and graphs from a weekly Twitch stream about, well,
EDA and graphs. The stream is currently on Wednesdays at 9pm, Pacific. 
If you want to participate and add some datasets, make a pull request and add 
your data in the `data-raw` folder. :)
